```{r results-spp, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
src <- c()
comb <- sort(report_spp1|> dplyr::filter(!is.na(order))|> dplyr::select(file_name)|> unlist()|> unique())

comb <- comb[!grepl(pattern = "octopuses", x = comb)] # temporary
comb <- comb[!grepl(pattern = "butterfly", x = comb)] # temporary
comb <- comb[!grepl(pattern = "-crab", x = comb)] # temporary
# comb <- comb[!grepl(pattern = "eulachon", x = comb)] # temporary
# comb <- comb[!grepl(pattern = "flathead", x = comb)] # temporary
for (jj in comb) { # [c(1:9, 11:16, 18:29, 31:length(comb))]
  a <- report_spp1[which(report_spp1$file_name == jj), ]
  spp_code <- a$species_code
  aa <- catch_haul_cruises|> 
    dplyr::filter(species_code %in% spp_code & year == maxyr)
  if (nrow(aa)>0) {
  src[[jj]] <- knitr::knit_expand(paste0(dir_code, '06_results_spp.Rmd'))
  }
}
res = knitr::knit_child(text = unlist(src), quiet = TRUE)
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
